@LankesterKaren @SurreyWaste @GuildfordBC @EnvAgencySE @DanHillTV @SurreyCouncil But that doesn't help us going forward with Stoney Castle. We need to concentrate on solutions rather than going over the decisions of the past. That van be done at a later date.

Part of a wider issue certainly but, had this case had oversight, it may well have been decided not to have been in the public interest to spend public money on a prosecution.

urls.title: Team GB athletes to fly the ‘preventing plastic pollution’ flag
urls.description: Team GB athletes have been invited to help kick plastics out of sport by making a pledge to tackle plastic pollution.

text:
🎒 Great to see an @EnvAgency flyer made of plantable seed paper has been included in Team GB's Tokyo Olympic 2020 kit bags, helping to eradicate plastic waste in sport. Read more about @hannahmills1988's @big_pledge campaign here: https://t.co/eJHWgIhG9e

#PlasticFreeJuly
